entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You recovered the stolen moisture harvester keyads from some water thieves.
entries.journal_entry_description: Help Peawp R'dwac rid the outskirts of Mos Eisley of undesirables.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to the scavenger camp and hunt some scavengers.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Some water thieves stole the keypads off of some moisture harvesters. Go get those keypads back.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Local water thieves have been stealing the keypads off of moisture harvesters. Recover those stolen keypads.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Peawp R'dawc and let her know you recovered the stolen moisture harvester keypads.
